bill.title: Cosmetologists; revise various provisions relating to.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 73-7-7, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require All Licensed Cosmetologists, Manicurists, Estheticians And Other Licensees To Display Photo Identification On The License Certificate Displayed In The Facility In Which The Cosmetology Services Are Provided; To Require All Such Licensees To Provide An Itemized Receipt Describing The Service And Prices Therefor To Each Customer To Whom The Services Are Provided; To Require The Licensee To Keep A Copy Of The Itemized Cashier's And Credit Card Receipts On File For A Period Not To Exceed Sixty Days; To Amend Section 73-7-27, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Fines For Certain Violations Of Rules And Regulations Established By The State Board Of Cosmetology And Make Such Violations Misdemeanor Offenses; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Human Services
